panels.name: Headline
text_labels: PopsCast was born from our love for meaningful stories and conversations. Starting from a small space and a big idea, we aim to create an audio space that is honest, touching, and inspiring.
Each episode is the result of research, curiosity, and the desire to present different perspectives—whether through personal monologues, panel discussions, or casual chats with special guests.
